article.Heading: Here's how industrialisation changed lives in rural Gujarat
article.Summary: CNBC-TV18's Farah Bookwala Vhora travels to the automotive and industrial hub of Sanand in Gujarat to understand economic and social manifestations in this region.
article.Body:
Hello and welcome to CNBC-TV18 pre-Budget special Budget Caravan where a team of reporters travel across the length and the breadth of the country to get you the pulse on the ground. I am Farah Bookwala Vhora and I have travelled all the way from Mumbai to the automotive and industrial hub of Sanand in Gujarat to understand economic and social manifestations in this region.

Watch videos for more..
